/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly modern skyscrapers, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky above. A few trees interspersed among the buildings add a touch of green to the urban landscape. The street itself is devoid of any visible traffic or pedestrians, giving it an unusually serene appearance amidst the city's usual hustle and bustle.
